channel.title: Version 2.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 2.2.0 (2021-09-09) Enhancements [feature] sitemap: hide hidden planks from sitemap an' SEO index'n #85 Fixes [bug] theme: fix showVisitedLinks 'n case Cap'n Hugo be configured t' modify relative URLs #86 Maintenance [task] theme: switch from data-vocabulary t' schema #84
